scenario.name: SIP_INVITE_GEOLOCATION_NOTIFY
scenario.send:
INVITE urn:service:sos SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] From: SENDER <sip:SENDER@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: urn:service:sos Call-ID: [call_id] Cseq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:SENDER@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] Geolocation: <cid:SENDER@[local_ip]>
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- t=0 0 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

NOTIFY sip:SENDER@[local_ip]:[local_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] From: SENDER <sip:SENDER@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Event: presence Contact: sip:SENDER@[local_ip]:[local_port] Subscription-State: active;expires=32 Content-Length: 1398 Content-Type: application/pidf+xml Content-ID: <SENDER@[local_ip]>
